EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Vendôme R&O Facility - New Legal Entity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 20, 2015
Dear Customer,
Last month, Honeywell Aerospace successfully completed the transition of its Secan Vendôme Repair & Overhaul (R&O) facility to a new legal entity – Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme. Although the Vendôme R&O business will operate at the same site, customers have been asked to update the supplier information in their procurement and account systems to reflect the new legal entity. As a result of this transition, Vendôme purchase orders must be submitted to the new legal entity via the mailing address below or Vendomerepairs@Honeywell.com <mailto:vendomerepairs@Honeywell.com>.
Vendôme invoices and release certificates will reference the new legal entity. The new Vendôme mailing address and remittance banking account information is below.
